import pymel.core as pm import os
outputPath = @folder+"/output.abc" endFrame = 0
abcFiles = os.listdir(@folder) beginProgress("Processing files", len(abcFiles))
abcList = [] for i, f in enumerate(abcFiles): if f.endswith(".abc"): stepProgress(i) abc = pm.PyNode(pm.AbcImport(@folder+"/"+f, mode="import",setToStartFrame=True)) abc.offset.set(endFrame) geo = abc.outPolyMesh[0].outputs()[0] geo.v.set(0)
abcList.append({"geo":geo, "frame":endFrame})
endFrame += abc.endFrame.get() endProgress()
orig = abcList[0]["geo"].duplicate()[0] orig.rename("original") orig.v.set(1) bs = pm.blendShape([item["geo"] for item in abcList], orig)[0]
NumPoses = len(abcList) beginProgress("Setting keyframes", len(NumPoses)) for i in range(NumPoses): stepProgress(i)
pm.currentTime(abcList[i]["frame"]) for k in range(NumPoses): if i==k: bs.weight[k].set(1) else: bs.weight[k].set(0)
pm.setKeyframe(bs.weight[k]) endProgress()
pm.keyTangent(bs, ott="step",animation="objects") pm.playbackOptions(min=1, max=endFrame)
pm.AbcExport(j="-frameRange 1 {endFrame} -dataFormat ogawa -root {node} -file {file}".format(endFrame=endFrame, node=orig, file=outputPath))
